QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Hornet
QuestData.Description:
That's it, I'm putting a bounty on that blasted hornet.
Every time I try to do some good old fashioned bare-handed fishing, that son of a bear comes after me.
Somebody take that bug down!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: "I'd do it myself, but I'm allergic." - Tagart
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Tagart at the Roughneck Camp.
QuestData.RewardText:
The hornet's dead! Good on ya, house cat.
I'd like to not die to a bug.
